casebody.data:
Lyons, administrator of Robinson, against Byrd and others. Thursday, June 16, 1808.

In this case a commission of 5 per cent was allowed to commissioners, who sold lands by virtue of a decree of the court.

THE commissioners, appointed by this Court to sell some of the lands of John Robinson, deceased, made their report, and claimed a commission* of five per cent, which the Court allowed.
